CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - Customer&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "Customer", "_self") + " - " + HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - Internal&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "Internal", "_self") + " - " + HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - Fix&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "Fix", "_self") + " - " + HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - ENG Task&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "ENG Task", "_self") + " - " + HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - System Issue&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "System Issue", "_self") + " - " + HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - AM/Sales&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "AM/Sales", "_self") + " - " + HYPERLINK( "/" + Id + "/e?save=1&notifyContact=0&cas7=Pending - 3rd Party&nooverride=1&retURL=/" + Id, "3rd Party", "_self")
CustomField.label: Set Status To
